quick_context: failprompt v0.1.0 published on npm. 75/75 tests passing. GitHub Actions + GitLab CI support with .gitlab-ci.yml config. ESLint strict type-checked config. All tasks (T-001 through T-004) done.

T-002.title: ESLint setup with typescript-eslint strict rules

T-001.title: Add GitLab CI support (CI_JOB_NAME, CI_PIPELINE_ID env vars, gitlab-ci.yml log format)

T-003.title: Add ESLint setup
T-003.notes:
Add `@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin` with strict rules. Low priority but good for contribution hygiene.

**From AAHP NEXT_ACTIONS**

T-004.title: Add GitLab CI support
T-004.notes:
Support GitLab pipelines in addition to GitHub Actions.

GitLab uses `CI_JOB_NAME`, `CI_PIPELINE_ID` env vars and `gitlab-ci.yml` log format. The `log-fetcher.ts` needs a GitLab adapter alongside the existing `gh` shell-out.

**From AAHP NEXT_ACTIONS**

NEXT_ACTIONS.md.summary: All tasks complete. 75/75 tests passing, npm published, GitHub Actions + GitLab CI.
